meta_data.description: 4000 Sq. Ft. - Rent 4 BHK Apartment / Flat in Kalpataru Vista, Sector 128 Noida * 10 Property & locality photos * Semifurnished * - 11th floor (out of 34). View contact number for free. Click for complete details on 99acres.com

structured_data.description: Kalpataru vista is one of noida's most sought after destination for residential flats and this 4 bhk flat for rent in sector 128 noida with 4000 sq.Ft., is your opportunity to be a part of this community. Property has attached 6 bathrooms & more than 3 balconies with 4 rooms set in 4000 sq.Ft. Super built-Up area. This flat is constructed on 4000 sq.Ft. Area. Parking available: 2 covered parking & 1 open parking. This flat lies on the 11th floor of a 34 storey building. Well maintained 1-5 years property. It is a semi-Furnished property. Inclusive of 20 light, 5 fan, 6 ac, 4 wardrobe, 5 geyser, 1 stove, 1 water purifier, 1 modular kitchen, 1 chimney, 1 curtains and 1 exhaust fan. Property is ready to be leased on any agreement type from fri, 07 nov 2025 for families, single men and single women only with a notice of 2 months for a duration of 11 months. We are offering this property on 1.5 lac monthly. 300000 is required to be paid as the initial payment. You will also get all modern property feature like reserved parking, power back-Up, security / fire alarm, water storage, feng shui / vaastu compliant and intercom facility. This place is equipped with quality features like swimming pool, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center, park, cctv surveillance, lift(s), dg availability, visitor parking and maintenance staff. Additional things included here are rain water harvesting, corner property, pet friendly, wheelchair friendly and in a gated society. Power backup: Full. The flat is north-East facing. The flat has wood flooring.
